action.name: Set value
action.param: "Filthy Enemy: " & newline & "Hp: " & Self.hp & "/" & Self.max_hp & newline & "Attack: " & Self.attack & "/s" & newline & "Item drop chance :" & Self.drop_chance & "\%" & newline & "Spawn-Timer Speed: " & Self.spawn_timer

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Filthy Enemy: " & newline & "Hp: " & Self.hp & "/" & Self.max_hp & newline & "Attack: " & Self.attack & "/s" & newline & "Item drop chance :" & Self.drop_chance & "\%" & newline & "Spawn-Timer Speed: " & Self.spawn_timer

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Oswald the Ranger Rabbit:" & newline & "Damage: " & HeroRabbit.damage & newline & "Range: " & HeroRabbit.range & " pixels"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Jay the Mighty Mantis:" & newline & "Damage: " & HeroMantis.damage & newline & "Attack Speed: " & HeroMantis.aspd & " attacks/s"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Memphis the Tortoise:" & newline & "Damage: " & HeroTortoise.damage & newline & "Speed: " & HeroTortoise.speed

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Lilo the Armadillo: " & newline & "Speed: " & HeroArmadillo.speed & newline & "Dig Time: " & HeroArmadillo.cooldown & "s"
